liposomal.description: Nutrient is encapsulated in a phospholipid bubble, significantly enhancing absorption.

lypospheric.description: A branded form of liposomal delivery, indicating high-end phospholipid encapsulation.

phytosome.description: Plant extract bound to phospholipids, improving absorption and bioavailability.

nanoemulsion.description: Ultra-fine oil droplets increase rapid absorption and bioavailability.

transdermal.description: Delivery through the skin for systemic absorption, such as patches.

phospholipid complex.description: Delivery system complexed with phospholipids enhancing effect.

pegylated.description: Coated with polyethylene glycol to prolong duration of action.

sublingual.description: Absorbed directly under the tongue, bypassing digestive system.

enteric-coated.description: Coating resists stomach acid, releasing ingredients in intestines.

micronized.description: Particles finely ground to improve absorption.

time-release.description: Ingredients released gradually over time for sustained delivery.

sustained-release.description: Gradual release to maintain stable blood levels.

chelated.description: Minerals bound to amino acids for improved absorption.

microencapsulation.description: Protective coating to shield ingredients, may improve stability.

effervescent.description: Dissolves in water for faster uptake.

beadlet.description: Pellets designed for timed or targeted release.

softgel.description: Gelatin shell improves solubility of fat-soluble vitamins.

ionized.description: Minerals manufactured to be electrically charged for absorption.

cold-processed.description: Manufactured at low temperatures to preserve ingredient integrity.

double liposomal.description: Dual-layered liposomal encapsulation for superior absorption and sustained retention.

capsule-in-capsule.description: Encapsulates multiple actives or stages for timed and targeted nutrient release.

gel chew.description: Emulsified gel bites, combining fat- and water-soluble nutrients for high bioavailability and compliance.

microgranule.description: Micro-sized granules engineered for specific timed, delayed, or extended release.

capsoil.description: Micronized lipophilic actives formulated into stable, high-absorption powders.

vesisorb.description: Colloidal droplet system that dramatically increases absorption of poorly bioavailable nutrients.
